item.title: 简配版 Model Y/3 正式发布
item.description:
Yesterday, Tesla officially released its new Model Y/3 vehicle — "Standard" (Standard Edition) — in the North American market. First, let's look at the prices: 昨天，特斯拉正式在北美市场发布了旗下 Model Y/3 全新车型 ——「Standard」（标准版），先看售价：

    Model Y Standard is priced at $39,990 USD (approximately 284,000 RMB)

    Model 3 Standard is priced at $36,990 USD (approximately 263,000 RMB)

With the introduction of the Standard version, Tesla has also adjusted its vehicle naming system. Above the entry-level Standard version is the Premium (Enhanced) version, which was previously the Long Range version, and above that is the Performance version. 随着标准版的出现，特斯拉对车辆的命名体系也做了调整，在入门标准版之上是 Premium （臻享） 版本，即原来的 Long Range（长续航版），再往上则是 Performance（性能版）。

In terms of exterior, the Model 3 Standard version has not undergone significant adjustments; the Model Y Standard version, however, has removed the iconic full-width light bar. Standard models offer 18/19-inch wheels, and body colors are limited to black, white, and gray. Additionally, the side mirrors are now manually folding. 外观方面，Model 3 标准版并未进行大幅度调整；Model Y 标准版则取消了标志的贯穿式灯带。标准版车型提供 18/19 寸轮毂，车身颜色则仅有黑白灰三种颜色可选。另外，后视镜变为手动折叠。

Regarding the interior, the Standard version's seat material has been changed to fabric, retaining front seat heating but removing ventilation; steering wheel adjustment is now manual; the rear touch control screen has been removed and replaced with manual air vents; all speakers are 7 (subwoofer removed); HEPA filter and Bioweapon Defense Mode have been removed. 内饰方面，标准版车型座椅材质更换为了织物材质，保留前排座椅加热，取消通风；方向盘调节更换为手动；后排触摸控制屏取消，变为手动空调出风口；扬声器均为 7 个（取消低音炮）；移除 HEPA 过滤器和生物武器防御模式。

It's worth noting that the Model Y Standard version has removed the glass roof and electric rear seat folding; while the Model 3 Standard version retains its original roof design. 值得一提的是，Model Y 标准版取消掉了玻璃天幕以及电动后排座椅折叠；而 Model 3 标准版则保留了原来的天幕设计。

In terms of performance, all Standard models feature a rear-wheel-drive motor, with 0-100 km/h acceleration times of 6.8 seconds (Model Y) and 5.8 seconds (Model 3), respectively; the Standard battery uses 69.5kWh, providing a range of 516 kilometers, and the peak charging power is limited to 225kW. 性能方面，标准版车型均为后驱电机，零百加速分别为 6.8 秒（Model Y）和 5.8 秒（Model 3）；标准版电池采用 69.5kWh，续航里程为 516 公里，充电峰值功率被控制在 225kW。

Compared to the original version, the two new cars have been reduced in price by approximately $5,000 and $5,500 respectively. Proportionally, their starting prices in the Chinese market might drop to around 230,000 yuan and 200,000 yuan respectively. 相较原版本，两款新车分别降价约 5000 美元和 5500 美元。若按比例推算，其在中国市场的起售价可能分别下探至 23 万元与 20 万元左右。

item.title: 2025 年诺贝尔化学奖公布
item.description:
On October 8, the Royal Swedish Academy of Sciences announced that the 2025 Nobel Prize in Chemistry would be awarded to Susumu Kitagawa, Richard Robson, and Omar M. Yaghi, in recognition of their pioneering contributions to the field of Metal–Organic Frameworks (MOF). 10 月 8 日，瑞典皇家科学院宣布，将 2025 年诺贝尔化学奖授予 Susumu Kitagawa、Richard Robson 和 Omar M. Yaghi， 以表彰他们在金属有机框架（Metal–Organic Frameworks，简称 MOF）领域的开创性贡献。

The three laureates will equally share the prize money of 11 million Swedish Kronor (equivalent to 8.36 million RMB). 三位获奖者将平分 1100 万瑞典克朗（折合人民币 836 万元）奖金。

It is understood that the metal-organic frameworks (MOFs) created by the three laureates have huge internal cavities, allowing molecules to freely enter and exit. Researchers use them to extract water from desert air, remove pollutants from water, capture carbon dioxide, and store hydrogen. 据了解，三名获奖者创造的金属有机框架（MOF）内部拥有巨大的空腔，分子可以自由进出。研究人员利用它从沙漠空气中提取水分，从水中去除污染物，捕获二氧化碳并储存氢气。

Over the past few decades, countless similar structures have been developed in laboratories around the world. Some are designed to capture carbon dioxide, some to separate per- and polyfluoroalkyl substances (PFAS) from water, others to precisely deliver drugs within the body, or safely handle extremely toxic gases. Some MOFs can even adsorb ethylene gas released by fruits, slowing down their ripening; others can encapsulate enzymes that break down antibiotic residues in the environment. 过去几十年里，全球各地的实验室研发出无数类似的结构。有的被设计用于捕捉二氧化碳，有的用于从水中分离全氟和多氟烷基物质（PFAS），还有的能在体内精准递送药物，或安全处理极度有毒的气体。有的 MOF 甚至可以吸附水果释放的乙烯气体，让它们更慢成熟；也有的能包裹分解环境中抗生素残留的酶。

Simply put, metal-organic frameworks have extremely wide-ranging applications. Susumu Kitagawa, Richard Robson, and Omar Yaghi were awarded the 2025 Nobel Prize in Chemistry because they were the first to create MOFs and demonstrate their enormous potential. 简单来说，金属有机框架的用途极其广泛。Susumu Kitagawa、Richard Robson 和 Omar Yaghi 之所以荣获 2025 年诺贝尔化学奖，是因为他们首次创造出 MOF，并展示了其巨大的潜力。

It is thanks to the work of the three laureates that chemists have been able to design thousands of different MOFs, leading to the birth of one miracle after another in the field of chemistry. 正是由于三位获奖者的工作，化学家们才能设计出成千上万种不同的 MOF，推动了化学领域一个又一个奇迹的诞生。

Heiner Linke, Chair of the Nobel Committee for Chemistry, stated: "Metal-organic frameworks have enormous potential, bringing unprecedented possibilities for customized functional materials." 诺贝尔化学委员会主席 Heiner Linke 表示：「金属有机框架具有巨大潜力，它为定制化功能材料带来了前所未有的可能性。」

Additionally, on October 7, the Royal Swedish Academy of Sciences announced that the 2025 Nobel Prize in Physics would be awarded to three quantum physicists, John Clarke, Michel H. Devoret, and John M. Martinis, in recognition of their contributions to realizing macroscopic quantum mechanical tunneling effects and energy quantization in circuits. 另外，瑞典皇家科学院在 10 月 7 日宣布，将 2025 年诺贝尔物理学奖授予 John Clarke、Michel H. Devoret 和 John M. Martinis 三名量子物理学家， 以表彰他们在电路中实现宏观量子力学隧穿效应和能量量子化方面的贡献。

The Nobel Committee for Physics stated on the same day that this year's Nobel Prize in Physics achievements have made possible the development of next-generation quantum technologies such as quantum cryptography, quantum computers, and quantum sensors. 诺贝尔物理学委员会当天表示，今年的诺贝尔物理学奖成果为开发量子密码学、量子计算机和量子传感器等下一代量子技术提供了可能。

On October 6, the Karolinska Institute in Sweden announced that the 2025 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine would be awarded to American scientists Mary E. Brunkow, Fred Ramsdell, and Japanese scientist Shimon Sakaguchi, in recognition of their pioneering discoveries in mechanisms of peripheral immune tolerance. 10 月 6 日，瑞典卡罗琳医学院宣布，将 2025 年诺贝尔生理学或医学奖授予美国科学家 Mary E. Brunkow、Fred Ramsdell 和日本科学家 Shimon Sakaguchi， 以表彰他们在外周免疫耐受机制方面的开创性发现。

item.title: 雷军：小米 17 系列首销成绩远超预期
item.guid: 雷军：小米-17-系列首销成绩远超预期
item.description:
Recently, Lei Jun, founder of Xiaomi, posted that the initial sales performance of the Xiaomi 17 series far exceeded expectations . 日前，小米创办人雷军发文表示， 小米 17 系列首销成绩远超预期 。

According to CCTV News, the Xiaomi 17 series has become a new favorite among consumers thanks to its unique "Miaoxiang Back Screen" innovation, imaging capabilities, and more, with sales exceeding 1 million units in just 5 days since its launch. 据央视新闻报道，小米 17 系列凭借独特的「妙享背屏」创新、影像能力等，成为消费者新宠， 开售仅 5 天销量破 100 万台。

According to blogger Digital Chat Station, the actual activated sales of the Xiaomi 17 series have exceeded 700,000, performing stronger than previous generations year-on-year, with offline sales for the entire series being 2-3 times that of online sales. 另据博主数码闲聊站消息， 小米 17 系列实际销售的激活量已破 70 万，同比强于前几代，全系线下销量是线上的 2-3 倍。

The Xiaomi 17 series was officially released on September 25, featuring three models: Xiaomi 17, 17 Pro, and 17 Pro Max. The two Pro models have a rear screen design; the entire series is equipped with large-capacity batteries and a new Leica imaging system; starting prices are 4499 yuan, 4999 yuan, and 5999 yuan respectively. 小米 17 系列于 9 月 25 日正式发布，共有小米 17、17 Pro 以及 17 Pro Max 三款机型，其中两款 Pro 机型拥有后置背屏设计；全系配备大容量电池、全新的徕卡影像系统；起售价分别为 4499 元、4999 元以及 5999 元。

After the launch of the Xiaomi 17 series, Xiaomi announced that within 5 minutes of the new series going on sale, it broke the sales and revenue records for all price segments of domestic mobile phones in 2025 for a full day of initial sales. 小米 17 系列开售后， 小米宣布新机全系开售 5 分钟，刷新 2025 年国产手机全价位段新机系列，首销全天销量、销额纪录。

According to Lu Weibing, Partner and President of Xiaomi Group, among the three new models, the Xiaomi 17 Pro Max sold the best, accounting for over 50% of the total series sales. Lu Weibing stated, "This shows that Xiaomi has gained recognition by continuously innovating and moving into the ultra-high-end market." 据小米集团合伙人、总裁卢伟冰透露，三款新机中， 小米 17 Pro Max 卖得最好，在全系中销量占比超过 50%。 卢伟冰表示，「这说明小米靠持续创新上探超高端，赢得了大家的认可。」

According to Jiemian News, in his annual speech and media interviews after the launch event, Lei Jun, founder of Xiaomi, stated that the Xiaomi 17 series fully benchmarks against the iPhone 17 series, with product capabilities achieving generational upgrades in areas such as battery, screen, and heat dissipation. 据界面新闻报道，在发布会后的年度演讲及媒体采访中，小米创办人雷军表示，小米 17 系列全面对标 iPhone 17 系列，产品力在电池、屏幕、散热等方面已实现跨代升级。

He emphasized: "This is the confidence and courage we have to rename it Xiaomi 17 and to directly confront the competition." 他强调：「这是我们敢改名小米 17，敢正面对垒的底气和勇气。」

item.title: OpenAI 多个重磅炸弹公布：ChatGPT 里直接装 App
item.guid: OpenAI-多个重磅炸弹公布：ChatGPT-里直接装-App
item.description:
Recently, OpenAI announced several key projects at DevDay: 日前，OpenAI 在 DevDay 上公布了多项重点项目：

    ChatGPT becomes a super App: directly calling third-party applications in conversations, AI actively recommending tools, and supporting in-app transaction monetization.

    AgentKit toolkit launched: visually drag-and-drop to build multi-Agent workflows, completing the entire process from development to deployment in minutes.

    Codex fully open: real-time code writing with natural language, supporting voice control and Slack integration, automatically reviewing PRs to improve team efficiency by 70%.

    Model API greatly upgraded: the strongest GPT-5 Pro API open, voice cost reduced by 70%, Sora 2 supports in-product video generation and fine control.

Among them, after ChatGPT supports direct calling of third-party applications, users only need one sentence, and applications such as Spotify and Canva can be automatically invoked in the conversation, and can also provide an interactive interface that can be directly operated. If you have subscribed to an external service, you can also log in to your account directly in ChatGPT for a seamless connection. 其中， ChatGPT 支持直接调用第三方应用后，用户只需一句话，Spotify、Canva 等应用就能在对话中自动唤起，还能提供可直接操作的交互界面。 如果已经订阅了某个外部服务，还能在 ChatGPT 里直接登录账户，无缝衔接。

It is reported that behind the aforementioned technology is OpenAI's newly released Apps SDK (Application Development Kit). Developers can now start building their own ChatGPT applications using the Apps SDK preview. 据悉，支撑上述技术的背后，是 OpenAI 全新发布的 Apps SDK（应用开发套件）。开发者现在可以使用 Apps SDK 预览版开始构建自己的 ChatGPT 应用。

It is worth mentioning that the Apps SDK is built on the Model Context Protocol (MCP) – an open protocol that allows developers to connect external data sources to AI systems, and also means that applications built with this standard can run on any compatible platform. 值得一提的是，Apps SDK 构建在 Model Context Protocol（MCP）之上——这是个开放协议，允许开发者把外部数据源连接到 AI 系统，同时也意味着用这个标准构建的应用能在任何兼容平台上跑。

According to the Financial Times, OpenAI signed a $1 trillion computing power cooperation agreement this year, which will be used to run its artificial intelligence models. 另据金融时报报道，OpenAI 今年签署了达 1 万亿美元的算力合作协议，并用于运行其人工智能模型。

Currently, NVIDIA, AMD, Oracle, and CoreWeave have already reached computing power cooperation with OpenAI. 目前，已与 OpenAI 达成算力合作的已有英伟达、AMD、甲骨文、CoreWeave。

These collaborations will provide OpenAI with over 20 gigawatts of computing power over the next decade. It is worth noting that the electricity required for this computing power will be approximately equal to that produced by 20 nuclear reactors. 而这些合作将会为 OpenAI 在未来十年内，提供超过 20 吉瓦的计算算力，值得一提的是，这些算力所需的电力将约等于 20 个核反应堆所产。

And the latest Reuters report shows that OpenAI's current valuation has reached $500 billion. According to a previous report by "The Information", OpenAI generated approximately $4.3 billion in revenue in the first half of 2025, an increase of about 16% compared to the entire previous year. 而路透社最新报道显示， OpenAI 目前估值已经达到 5000 亿美元。 据《The Information》此前报道， OpenAI 在 2025 年上半年创造了约 43 亿美元的收入，比去年全年增长了约 16%。

item.title: 中国科研团队突破全固态电池实用瓶颈
item.guid: 中国科研团队突破全固态电池实用瓶颈
item.description:
According to Science and Technology Daily, important progress has recently been made in the research of interface contact for all-solid-state metal lithium batteries. 据科技日报报道，全固态金属锂电池界面接触研究日前迎来重要进展。

The report states that a team led by Researcher Huang Xuejie from the Institute of Physics, Chinese Academy of Sciences/Beijing National Laboratory for Condensed Matter Physics, in collaboration with Professor Zhang Heng's team from Huazhong University of Science and Technology and Researcher Yao Xiayin's team from Ningbo Institute of Materials Technology and Engineering, Chinese Academy of Sciences, has developed an anion regulation technology that can form a brand new interface between the electrode and the electrolyte. 报道称，中国科学院物理研究所/北京凝聚态物理国家研究中心黄学杰研究员团队，联合华中科技大学张恒教授团队、中国科学院宁波材料技术与工程研究所姚霞银研究员团队，开发出一种阴离子调控技术，能够在电极和电解质之间形成一层全新的界面。

Specifically, this research solves a tricky problem for all-solid-state metal lithium batteries: the solid electrolyte and metal lithium electrode must maintain close contact. Traditional methods rely on bulky external equipment to continuously apply pressure, making the battery large and heavy, and difficult to put into practical application. 具体来看， 本次研究解决了全固态金属锂电池的一个棘手难题：固态电解质和金属锂电极之间必须保持紧密接触，传统做法要靠笨重的外部设备持续施压，导致电池又大又重，难以投入实际应用。

To solve this problem, the research team developed a new technology: they introduced iodide ions into the sulfide electrolyte. This interface can actively attract lithium ions, automatically filling all gaps and pores like "self-healing," thus keeping the electrode and electrolyte tightly fitted. 为了解决这一难题，研究团队开发出一种新技术：他们在硫化物电解质中引入了碘离子。这层界面能够主动吸引锂离子，像「自我修复」一样自动填充进所有的缝隙和孔洞，从而让电极和电解质始终保持紧密贴合。

More importantly, the prototype battery prepared based on this technology still maintains stable and excellent performance after hundreds of charge-discharge cycles under standard test conditions, far exceeding the level of existing similar batteries. 更重要的是， 基于该技术制备出的原型电池，在标准测试条件下循环充放电数百次后，性能依然稳定优异，远远超过现有同类电池的水平。

Researchers stated that the advantages of this new design are very obvious: it is not only simpler to manufacture and uses fewer materials, but also makes batteries more durable. They particularly emphasized that this technology can be used in the future to create batteries with an energy density exceeding 500 Wh/kg , which is expected to more than double the battery life of electronic devices. 研究人员表示，这种新设计的优势非常明显：它不仅制造更简单、用料更省，还能让电池更耐用。他们特别强调， 采用这项技术未来可以做出能量密度超过 500 瓦时/千克 的电池 ，这样一来，电子设备的续航时间有望提升两倍以上。

Relevant research results were published on October 7 in "Nature Sustainability" and "Advanced Materials" journals. 相关研究成果 10 月 7 日发表于《自然·可持续发展》杂志以及《先进材料》杂志。

item.title: 马斯克晒擎天柱机器人练功夫
item.guid: 马斯克晒擎天柱机器人练功夫
item.description:
Recently, Musk shared a video of Tesla's Optimus humanoid robot imitating human kung fu movements. 近期，马斯克晒出一段特斯拉 Optimus（擎天柱）人形机器人模仿人类动作打功夫的视频。

The video shows the Optimus Gen 2 robot, which almost perfectly replicates the demonstrator's movements and postures, with low latency and smooth, continuous actions throughout. 视频中展示的为 Optimus 二代机器人，其几乎一比一还原了演示人员的动作姿态，并且全程延迟较低，动作较为连贯流畅。

It's worth mentioning that Musk stated in the comments section that this was not remote-controlled operation, but rather completed through AI learning for this "kung fu practice." 值得一提的是，马斯克在评论区表示， 这并非遥控操作，而是通过 AI 学习完成了本次「练功夫」。

Additionally, Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang recently revealed in a CNBC report that he was very excited about the funding opportunities for Musk's xAI, and even regretted not investing more money in xAI. 另外， 英伟达 CEO 黄仁勋日前在接受 CNBC 报道时透露，自己对马斯克旗下的 xAI 融资机会感到十分兴奋，甚至抱有遗憾 —— 没给 xAI 投入更多钱。

Huang Renxun stated that he essentially wants to personally get involved in everything Musk participates in. He also said that this was not a vendor financing. 黄仁勋表示，基本上每一件马斯克参与的事情，自己都想切身加入进去。其还表示，这并不是一次供应商融资。

According to Bloomberg, Nvidia will invest up to $2 billion in xAI's equity. The report also stated that the financing, including equity and debt, will be linked to the Nvidia graphics processing units that xAI plans to use in its Colossus 2 data center. 据彭博社报道，英伟达将在 xAI 的股权部分投资高达 20 亿美元。报道还表示，包括股权和债务的融资将与 xAI 计划在其数据中心 Colossus 2 中使用的英伟达图形处理单元挂钩。

It is reported that xAI's current round of financing will increase to $20 billion. 据悉，xAI 本轮融资将提高至 200 亿美元。

item.title: 清华物理天才姚顺宇官宣跳槽 DeepMind
item.guid: 清华物理天才姚顺宇官宣跳槽-DeepMind
item.description:
Yesterday, Yao Shunyu announced on his personal blog that he had moved from Anthropic to Google DeepMind. 昨日，姚顺宇（Yao Shunyu）在个人博客官宣从 Anthropic 跳槽到了 Google DeepMind。

It should be noted that there are currently two prominent researchers named Yao Shunyu in the field of large models. The protagonist of this article, Yao Shunyu, graduated from Tsinghua University with a bachelor's degree, and his research interests span theoretical condensed matter, quantum chaos, and high-energy physics. 需要说明的是，如今在大模型领域，叫 Yao Shunyu 的大名鼎鼎研究者其实有两位。本次主角 —— 姚顺宇本科毕业于清华，研究兴趣横跨理论凝聚态、量子混沌与高能物理。

As for the story of the other Yao Shunyu (姚顺雨), you can refer to our previous report: Tencent refutes rumors of OpenAI's Yao Shunyu joining with a 100 million salary; the 27-year-old Tsinghua Yao Class genius has begun his second half. 至于另一位 Yao Shunyu（姚顺雨）的故事，可以翻看我们此前的报道：腾讯辟谣 OpenAI 姚顺雨 1 亿薪资入职，27 岁清华姚班天才已开启下半场。

In October 2024, Yao Shunyu officially joined the Anthropic Claude team and began researching large models. He announced his departure in less than a year. As of 2025, his total paper citations reached 5020 (with 4678 accumulated after 2020), and his h-index was 14. 2024 年 10 月，姚顺宇正式加入 Anthropic Claude 团队，开始搞大模型研究。结果干了不到一年，就官宣跳槽了。而截至 2025 年，其论文总引用次数达到 5020 次（其中 2020 年后积累了 4678 次），h 指数为 14。

Although Yao Shunyu believed Anthropic was one of the best starting points for physicists entering AI research, he officially resigned from Anthropic on September 19 and joined Google DeepMind on September 29. He gave two reasons in his blog: 虽然姚顺宇认为 Anthropic 是物理学家进入 AI 研究的最佳起点之一，但他还是在 9 月 19 日从 Anthropic 正式离职，9 月 29 日加入 Google DeepMind。他在博客里给出了两个原因：

In the blog post published yesterday, Yao Shunyu also candidly explained his original intention for transitioning to AI. Although theoretical physics is profound and requires extensive knowledge of mathematics, computer science, and physics, this field has seen almost no new experimental breakthroughs for many years. A discipline lacking experiments makes it difficult to objectively judge the importance of research and to resolve disagreements through systematic experimentation. 在昨日公开的博客信里，姚顺宇还坦诚地阐述了转向 AI 的初衷。理论物理虽然思想深邃，需要数学、计算机科学和物理的广博知识，但这个领域多年来几乎没有新的实验突破。一个缺乏实验的学科，很难客观判断研究的重要性，也很难通过系统化实验来化解分歧。

Therefore, he ultimately chose AI over quantum computing. Although quantum computing will be very important in the future, the current bottleneck is mainly on experimental platforms. In contrast, AI attracted him more because it shares some similarities with physics research. 所以他最终在 AI 和量子计算之间选了前者。虽然量子计算未来会很重要，但目前瓶颈主要在实验平台上。相比之下，AI 更吸引他，因为和物理研究有某种相似之处。

item.title: 大疆宣布降价，已购消费者退货维权登上热搜
item.guid: 大疆宣布降价，已购消费者退货维权登上热搜
item.description:
Recently, DJI announced that it will officially kick off its Double Eleven shopping festival on October 9, with price reductions on many popular products: 日前，大疆宣布将在 10 月 9 日正式开启双十一狂欢，多款热门产品降价：

  • The handheld gimbal camera Pocket 3 has a maximum direct discount of 900 yuan, bringing the standard version price to 2799 yuan; 手持云台相机 Pocket 3 最高直降 900 元，标准版售价来到 2799 元；
  • The action camera Action 4 has a maximum direct discount of 949.8 yuan, bringing the standard kit price to 1248.65 yuan; 运动相机 Action 4 最高直降 949.8 元，标准套装价格来到 1248.65 元；
  • The drone DJI Mini 3 has a direct discount of 500 yuan, with a starting price of 2088 yuan; the DJI Mini 4K has a direct discount of 700 yuan, with a price of 1499 yuan; 无人机 DJI Mini 3 直降 500 元，起售价来到 2088 元；DJI Mini 4K 直降 700 元，售价来到 1499 元；
  • The DJI Osmo Mobile series stabilizers have a maximum direct discount of 200 yuan, with the SE model costing only 299 yuan. 稳定器 DJI Osmo Mobile 系列最高直降 200 元，其中 SE 机型只需 299 元。

Yesterday, "DJI price drop announcement: consumers who already bought products seek refunds and rights protection" trended on Weibo. Many consumers who had just purchased DJI products that were about to be discounted began to assert their rights on shopping platforms and social media, striving for price differences refunds. 而在昨日，「大疆预告降价已购买消费者退货维权」冲上微博热搜， 不少刚刚购买了大疆即将降价产品的消费者开始在购物平台、社交媒体上维权，争取退差价。

According to reports from Yicai and Red Star News, a search for "DJI" on social media platforms like Xiaohongshu reveals many consumers who recently purchased DJI products are seeking rights protection, communicating online and offline for price difference refunds or returns. Many consumers who successfully returned products also shared their rights protection experiences in their notes. 据第一财经、红星新闻报道，在小红书等社交媒体上检索「大疆」，可发现许多刚刚购买了大疆的消费者正在进行维权，线上、线下沟通退差价或者退货退款。许多成功退货的消费者还在笔记中分享了自己的维权经验。

According to Red Star News, multiple calls to DJI's official customer service were met with the response, "We apologize, there are currently a large number of customer service inquiries." 据红星新闻称，多次致电大疆官方客服，均被告知「很抱歉，当前咨询客服比较多。」

Afterwards, when a reporter, acting as a consumer, consulted DJI's online customer service about 'how to get price protection for offline purchases,' the online customer service replied: 'Due to different sales models across various channels, we cannot directly process your price protection request. You need to contact the sales staff at the corresponding store, which will allow them to provide you with a solution more quickly.' 而后，记者以消费者身份与大疆线上客服咨询「线下购买如何价保」时，在线客服回复称：「因不同渠道的销售模式不同，我们无法直接为您处理价保需求，需要您联系对应门店的销售人员，这样可以更快捷地为您提供相应方案。」

item.title: 💡 Cursor 创始人：AI 编程处于漫长复杂的「中间阶段」
item.guid: 💡-Cursor-创始人：AI-编程处于漫长复杂的「中间阶段」
item.description:
In September, Michael Truell, co-founder and CEO of AI programming platform Cursor, was interviewed in-depth by Y Combinator, sharing some of Cursor's development journey and his personal insights into the industry. 9 月，AI 编程平台 Cursor 的联合创始人兼 CEO Michael Truell 接受了 Y Combinator 的一次深度访谈，其在节目中分享了 Cursor 的部分发展之路以及个人对行业的见解。

Before officially founding Cursor, Truell's team experienced several costly failures, such as spending six months building a 'Copilot' in the CAD field for mechanical engineers, and an end-to-end encrypted communication system, but ultimately both failed due to a lack of domain passion and sparse user feedback. 在正式创立 Cursor 之前，Truell 的团队经历了数次代价高昂的失败，如耗时六个月，为机械工程师打造 CAD 领域的「Copilot」，以及端到端加密通信系统，但最终都因缺乏领域热情、用户反馈寥寥而宣告失败。

'That sense of helplessness actually helped us clarify the direction we truly cared about and pursued,' Truell admitted. It was these failures that made the team realize their true passion lay in 'the future of coding.' 「那种『无奈感』反而帮助我们明晰了自己真正关心和追求的方向，」Truell 坦言。正是这些失败，让团队意识到他们内心真正的热情在于「编码的未来」。

At the time, they firmly believed that 'the entire coding field could change in the next five years, and all software development might be completed through models,' yet existing players were not fully moving in this direction. 当时的他们坚信，「在未来五年里，整个编码领域都有可能发生改变，所有软件开发都可能通过模型来完成」，而现有玩家并未全力朝这个方向迈进。

Regarding how AI will reshape programming, Truell believes the industry is in a long and complex 'intermediate stage.' 'AI will increasingly resemble your colleague, or a very advanced compiler, but you will still need to read logic, review, and edit.' 对于 AI 将如何重塑编程，Truell 认为行业正处在一个漫长而复杂的「中间阶段」。「AI 会越来越像你的同事，或者一个非常高级的编译器，但你仍然需要阅读逻辑、进行审查和编辑。」

During the conversation, Truell also offered his advice to the younger generation of developers and entrepreneurs: 对话中，Truell 还向年轻一代的开发者和创业者给出了自己的建议：

I think the most important thing is to do what you are truly interested in, and to do it with people you enjoy being with and deeply respect, and to take it very seriously. Avoid 'checking boxes' just to complete tasks; instead, focus on building things you are genuinely interested in that can accumulate long-term value.

item.title: 消息称 M5 iPad Pro 或即将推出
item.description:
Recently, reporter Mark Gurman wrote that the supply of iPad Pro M4 is limited in Apple retail stores and online channels, with some configurations even experiencing delays, which is a clear sign that Apple is about to launch the M5 iPad Pro. 日前，记者 Mark Gurman 发文称， iPad Pro M4 在苹果零售店及线上渠道的供应数量有限，部分配置甚至出现延迟，而这也是苹果一个即将推出 M5 iPad Pro 的明确迹象。

Gurman also stated that the entry-level 14-inch MacBook Pro is experiencing the same situation, while models equipped with M4 Pro/Max (14/16-inch MacBook Pro) are not facing inventory shortages. Gurman 还称，入门级的 14 英寸 MacBook Pro 也出现上了上述情况，而搭载 M4 Pro/Max 的机型（14/16 英寸 MacBook Pro）则未出现库存紧张的情况。

According to previous leaks, the M5 iPad Pro is planned to be the first model to feature the M5 chip; in addition to processor improvements, Apple may also add a front-facing camera for selfies (similar to previous front cameras placed on the short side of the screen). 据此前消息曝光，M5 iPad Pro 计划作为 M5 的首发机型登场；除了处理器提升，苹果还可能会在正面加入一枚用于自拍的镜头（类似以前放在屏幕短边侧的前置摄像头）。

On October 2, Gurman also revealed that Apple has paused its comprehensive upgrade plans for Vision Pro and reallocated resources to smart glasses projects to counter the strong impact of Meta's AI glasses. 10 月 2 日，Gurman 还发文透露， 苹果暂停了对 Vision Pro 的全面升级计划，同时将资源分配到了智能眼镜项目上，以此对抗 Meta 的 AI 眼镜强势的冲击。

Specifically, the 'N100' headset project, originally planned to be lighter, cheaper, and released in 2027, has been halted by Apple, and its personnel have been transferred to the research and development of smart glasses. 具体来看，原计划更轻便、更便宜、2027 年发布的「N100」头显项目已被苹果喊停，而该项目的人员已转移至智能眼镜的研发。

The report states that Apple is currently preparing two smart glasses products: a screenless smart glasses codenamed 'N50,' planned for release next year; and a screen-equipped glasses product, benchmarked against Meta Ray-Ban Display, originally planned for 2028, for which Apple is seeking to accelerate development. 报道称，苹果目前正在准备两款智能眼镜产品：一款代号为「N50」的无屏智能眼镜，计划明年推出；而对标 Meta Ray-Ban Display 的带屏眼镜，原计划 2028 年发布，苹果则正在寻求加快开发进度。

According to MacRumors, the iPad mini 8 is also on its way. 另据 MacRumors 报道， iPad mini 8 也已经在来的路上。

The new iPad mini will feature an increased screen size, from the original 8.3 inches to 8.7 inches, and will use OLED display technology; for the processor, it will adopt the same A19 Pro chip as the iPhone Air. 新款 iPad mini 屏幕尺寸将加大，从原先的 8.3 英寸增大至 8.7 英寸，并且采用 OLED 显示技术；处理器方面则采用 iPhone Air 同款 A19 Pro。

item.title: 真我 GT8 Pro 将与理光合作
item.description:
Realme has just officially announced a strategic imaging partnership with Ricoh Imaging, and the upcoming Realme GT8 Pro is expected to be the first product of their collaboration. 刚刚，真我正式宣布，将与理光映像达成影像战略合作，而即将发布的真我 GT8 Pro 也有望成为双方合作的首款产品。

It is reported that the Realme GT8 Pro will feature a modular rear camera design. From the leaked information, the new phone will adopt a triple rear camera system with a periscope telephoto lens. 据悉，真我 GT8 Pro 将采用拼装式后置镜头模组设计。从透露的信息来看，新机将采用后置三摄系统，拥有潜望式长焦。

According to Digital Chat Station and Xu Qi, the Realme GT8 Pro will feature a 50MP 1/1.56-inch large sensor main camera and a 200-megapixel telephoto lens, while the ultra-wide-angle will also be upgraded. 据数码闲聊站与徐起透露， 真我 GT8 Pro 将采用 50MP 1/1.56 英寸大底主摄以及 2 亿长焦，同时超广角也会升级。

In other aspects, the Realme GT8 Pro will feature a 2K flat screen, supporting full-brightness DC-like dimming + circular polarized light eye protection; it will be equipped with Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 and the Sky Signal Chip S1, supporting 21 5G frequency bands (including n79); it will also come with two 1115E speakers and support wireless charging. 其他方面，真我 GT8 Pro 将采用 2K 直屏，支持全亮度类 DC 调光 + 圆偏振光护眼；搭载骁龙 8 Elite Gen 5 和苍穹信号芯片 S1，支持 21 个 5G 频段（含 n79）；配备两枚 1115E 扬声器，支持无线充电。

The new machine is expected to be released in October. 新机预计 10 月发布。

item.title: 索尼 α7 V 被曝或 11 月发布
item.description:
Recently, Sony Alpha Rumors posted an article revealing that Sony is expected to announce its latest full-frame mirrorless camera, the α7 V (ILCE-7M5), in November this year, with official shipments possibly starting in January or February next year. 日前，Sony Alpha Rumors 发文透露，索尼有望在今年 11 月公布旗下最新全画幅无反相机 α7 V（ILCE-7M5），并且或会在明年 1、2 月正式发货。

It is revealed that the α7 V will be equipped with a 33-megapixel full-frame sensor , though it is not yet confirmed if it's an upgraded version of the α7 IV (ILCE-7M4) sensor. Notably, the new camera will feature an AI chip similar to the one on the α1 II. 据透露， α7 V 将配备一块 3300 万像素的全幅传感器 ，暂未确定是否为 α7 IV（ILCE-7M4）的升级版传感器。值得一提的是， 新机将搭载类似 α1 II 上的 AI 芯片。

Regarding the body, the new camera will adopt the same body design as the α7rV (ILCE-7RM5), featuring a four-way vari-angle screen and a consistent control button layout. 机身方面，新机将采用 α7rV（ILCE-7RM5）相同的机身设计，拥有四向翻转屏以及一致的操控按钮布局。

In terms of price, the α7 V is expected to cost around $3000 USD, which is approximately 21358 RMB. 价格方面，α7 V 售价或为 3000 美元，约合人民币 21358 元。

item.title: 微信灰测「批量撤回消息」功能
item.guid: 微信灰测「批量撤回消息」功能
item.description:
According to Kuaikeji, some netizens recently posted that WeChat has launched a feature to batch recall messages. 据快科技报道，近期有网友发文称微信推出批量撤回消息功能。

It is understood that when a user long-presses a message sent within two minutes in the WeChat chat box and taps "Recall," two options will appear: "Recall this message" and "Recall all messages sent this time." 据了解，当用户在微信聊天框中长按两分钟内发送的消息并点击「撤回」时，会出现两个选项：「撤回该条消息」和「撤回本次发送的全部消息」。

By selecting "Recall all messages sent this time," you can recall all messages sent at once (including text, pictures, voice messages, etc.) without having to operate them one by one. This eliminates the panic of not being able to recall all messages when you send something wrong. 选择「撤回本次发送的全部消息」即可一次性撤回本次发送的所有消息（包括文字、图片、语音等），无需逐条操作，再也不怕发错消息时手忙脚乱却撤不完的情况。

It should be noted that this feature is still in the grayscale testing phase, and only some users can access it. 需要注意的是，该功能还在灰度测试阶段，只有部分用户可以使用。

It is reported that regular WeChat messages, such as text, voice, emojis, and pictures, can be recalled within 2 minutes. Text messages can be re-edited within 5 minutes after being recalled, eliminating the need for re-typing; file content, such as Word, Excel, and PPT, supports recall within 3 hours. 据悉，微信常规消息可在 2 分钟内撤回，如文字、语音、表情包、图片等。其中，文字消息撤回后 5 分钟内可重新编辑，无需重新输入；文件内容则支持 3 小时撤回，如 Word、Excel、PPT 等。

After all messages are recalled, the recipient will see a notification indicating that the sender has recalled a message. 所有消息撤回之后，对方都会看到相关提醒，提示对方撤回一条消息。

Regarding why the recipient is notified after a recall, Tencent once stated that in certain specific situations, such as business negotiations or lending, recalling messages without a text notification could lead to one party suffering losses. 对于为何撤回之后要提醒对方，腾讯曾表示，如果在一些商务谈判或借贷等特定场合，撤回信息无文字提示，可能会导致一方出现利益受损的情况。

item.title: 2025「国庆中秋」假期数据报告公布
item.guid: 2025「国庆中秋」假期数据报告公布
item.description:
Yesterday, WeChat Pay released the "2025 WeChat National Day and Mid-Autumn Festival Data Report." 昨日，微信派公布了《2025 微信国庆中秋数据报告》。

The report shows that new first-tier cities and county-level markets have great potential: total consumption increased by 10% compared to the May Day holiday. Among them, Chongqing's consumption amount became the "national first" in both consumption amount and transaction count (excluding Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou, and Shenzhen). 报告显示，新一线城市与县域市场潜力大：消费总额对比五一假期增幅达到了 10%。其中重庆消费金额成为消费金额、笔数双「全国第一」（除北上广深）。

Among popular consumption industries, sports and fitness consumption transactions increased by 16% year-on-year; both beauty and hairdressing expenditure and digital product consumption expenditure increased by 11% year-on-year. 而热门消费行业中，运动健身消费笔数同比增长 16%；美容美发金额和数码产品消费金额均同比增长 11%。

According to CCTV News, from October 1st to 8th, 2025, the cumulative cross-regional personnel flow across society is expected to reach 2.432 billion person-times, with a daily average of 304 million person-times, a year-on-year increase of 6.2% (compared to the daily average of the 7-day National Day holiday in 2024, hereinafter the same). Among them: 据央视新闻报道，2025 年 10 月 1 日—8 日，累计全社会跨区域人员流动量预计 24.32 亿人次，日均 3.04 亿人次，同比（2024 年国庆假期 7 天日均，下同）增长 6.2%。其中：

    The cumulative railway passenger volume is expected to be 153 million person-times, with a daily average of 19.24 million person-times, a year-on-year increase of 2.6%;

    The cumulative highway personnel flow (including non-commercial small passenger vehicle travel on expressways and ordinary national/provincial roads, and commercial highway passenger volume) is expected to be 2.247 billion person-times, with a daily average of 280 million person-times, a year-on-year increase of 6.5%.

    Among these, the cumulative commercial highway passenger volume is expected to be 306 million person-times, with a daily average of 38.33 million person-times, a year-on-year increase of 2.9%; the cumulative non-commercial small passenger vehicle travel on expressways and ordinary national/provincial roads is expected to be 1.94 billion person-times, with a daily average of 242 million person-times, a year-on-year increase of 7.1%.

    The cumulative waterway passenger volume is expected to be 11.67 million person-times, with a daily average of 1.46 million person-times, a year-on-year increase of 4.2%.

    Accumulated civil aviation passenger volume is estimated to be 19.17 million person-times, with an average daily of 2.4 million person-times, a year-on-year increase of 3.4%.

item.title: 华为工程人员回应「鸿蒙 5 App 不适配」：有些群体别升级
item.guid: 华为工程人员回应「鸿蒙-5-App-不适配」：有些群体别升级
item.description:
According to Sina Finance, recently, blogger Wang Xiaodong, who claims to be an old Huawei fan, complained on social media about Huawei's HarmonyOS 5.1 system, stating that after upgrading from HarmonyOS 4.3 to 5.1, mainstream applications like WeChat and Douyin were unable to "fully compatible and adapted," leading to some functions not working properly. 据新浪财经报道，近日，有自称华为老粉的博主王晓东在社交媒体吐槽华为鸿蒙 5.1 系统，称自己从鸿蒙 4.3 升级至鸿蒙 5.1 后遭遇微信、抖音等主流应用无法「完全兼容适配」，部分功能无法正常使用。

He also stated that after personally going to a Huawei after-sales store to "flash" back to the previous version, he wasted a lot of time and encountered "partial data loss." The relevant content was widely forwarded and resonated with consumers, with many users claiming to have been "driven crazy" and "scammed" by HarmonyOS 5. 其还表示，在亲自跑到华为售后门店「刷机」回退此前版本后，却也浪费了大量时间，且遭遇「部分数据丢失」。相关内容被大量转发并引发消费者共鸣，大量用户自称被鸿蒙 5 系统「逼疯了」「坑死了」。

In response, Huawei consumer hotline engineers replied and revealed that, because HarmonyOS 5 is a completely self-developed operating system and no longer based on Android, all applications on it need to be redesigned and redeveloped. 对此，华为消费者热线工程人员回应并透露， 由于鸿蒙 5 操作系统全面自研，不再基于安卓系统开发，这导致其上的各类应用均需进行重新设计开发。

Engineers stated that, although most software "has 80% of its functions online," some functions are still under development and adaptation, and groups such as video creators "are not advised to upgrade to HarmonyOS 5.1 for now." 工程人员表示， 虽然，目前大部分软件「已上线 80% 的功能」，但仍有部分功能还在开发适配中，视频创作者等群体「暂不建议升级至鸿蒙 5.1」。

In July this year, the number of HarmonyOS 5 devices exceeded 10 million. According to Huawei Executive Director and CEO of Consumer BG Richard Yu, who revealed before the National Day holiday, the number of HarmonyOS 5 devices has now exceeded 20 million. The rapid increase in device numbers means that HarmonyOS 5 has entered a new stage of accelerated growth. 今年 7 月，鸿蒙 5 终端数突破 1000 万。据华为常务董事、终端 BG 董事长余承东国庆前夕透露，目前鸿蒙 5 终端设备已突破 2000 万。快速的设备数攀升，意味着鸿蒙 5 已经进入加速成长的新阶段。

In mid-August, when discussing the development of the HarmonyOS operating system, Richard Yu likened the construction of a mobile operating system and ecosystem to the philosophical debate of "which came first, the chicken or the egg." 8 月中旬，余承东在谈及鸿蒙操作系统的发展时，曾将移动操作系统和生态的建设，视为这是「先有鸡还是先有蛋」的哲学思辨。

In his view, when an operating system is just released, many applications have not yet been developed, and whether users can tolerate it is a problem. But if you wait until the system is mature to release it, without a user base, no one will be willing to develop applications. 在他看来，操作系统刚发布，很多应用还没有做出来，用户能不能承受得了是一个问题。但如果等系统成熟了再发布，没有用户基础，大家也不愿意开发应用。

item.title: 《三角洲行动》发文回应「撤离点人数限制」争议
item.guid: 《三角洲行动》发文回应「撤离点人数限制」争议
item.description:
Recently, "Delta Force: Hawk Ops" released a balance update for the Fire Zone, announcing that some extraction points will have an overload mechanism, and Deep Blue will be further weakened. This adjustment sparked heated discussion among players online. 日前，《三角洲行动》发布烽火地带平衡性更新，宣布部分撤离点增加超载机制，深蓝再次削弱。而此次调整在网上引起玩家热议。

Yesterday, the official "Delta Force: Hawk Ops" issued an apology, admitting that recent updates had caused widespread player dissatisfaction, and announced optimization and compensation measures. The official stated that the team saw many opinions and criticisms and deeply realized the abruptness and impropriety of their handling. 昨日，《三角洲行动》官方发布致歉公告，承认近期更新引发大规模玩家不满，并宣布优化及补偿措施。官方表示，团队看到了许多意见与批评，也深刻意识到处理方式的突兀与不妥。

In its response, the official "Delta Force: Hawk Ops" explained the controversy surrounding the adjustments: 回应中，《三角洲行动》官方解释了相关调整争议：

    Emergency adjustments made for the "shared prison" phenomenon: The official discovered that Tidal Prison began to see combinations of three shields or two shields, with cross-team alliances fighting against other teams, affecting the game experience, and quickly evolving into a phenomenon of pulling all generators across the map and directly extracting. As "shared prison" rapidly spread, what might follow is rapid "material farming" leading to continuous soaring prices of equipment, with large red and gold items becoming "cabbage prices," thereby affecting other maps and the broader game experience.

    Extraction point player limit: The current solution was an emergency decision made after the official discovered abnormal data that gradually affected the entire game. Regarding why the limit was imposed, the official stated, "to minimize the impact on mixed extraction while reducing the occurrence of the above situations."

Currently, the game team is also evaluating better solutions to improve the "shared prison" phenomenon to ensure the stability of the overall economy and matches, and will continue gray-scale testing and optimization. Starting October 9, the 5-person extraction limit for the Aerospace Base and Bakshe maps will be gradually lifted. 目前，游戏团队也正在评估更优方案来改善「共享监狱」现象，以保障大盘经济及对局的稳定性，并将持续灰度测试及优化。10 月 9 日起，航天基地、巴克什两张地图的撤离 5 人限制将逐步解除。

Additionally, the game official also provided an explanation regarding the "Long Alligator Reaching for the Moon" content: 另外，游戏官方还针对「长鳄奔月」相关内容进行说明：

In July, we brainstormed a Mid-Autumn Festival pun "Long Alligator Reaching for the Moon" (长鳄奔月, a homophone for Chang'e Reaching for the Moon) and prepared Mid-Autumn activities and a fun video. However, due to current events, we paused the video release. The in-game activity text was integrated into the game before the September 17 version update, not added temporarily, and there is no, nor would we dare to have, any insinuation or hidden meaning. We sincerely apologize for the misunderstanding. 7 月时，我们脑洞了一个「长鳄奔月」的中秋谐音梗，并准备了中秋活动和趣味视频。但由于当前事件，我们暂停了视频发布。游戏内活动的文案是在 9 月 17 日版本更新前就合入游戏的内容，并非临时加入，不存在、也绝对不敢有任何影射和内涵的行为，十分抱歉让大家误会了。

item.title: 2025 国庆档总票房破 18 亿
item.description:
According to Lighthouse Professional, as of 15:44 on October 8, the total box office for the 2025 National Day holiday period (October 1 - October 8) exceeded 1.8 billion yuan. Specifically: 据灯塔专业版消息，截至 10 月 8 日 15 时 44 分，2025 年国庆档（10 月 1 日—10 月 8 日）档期总票房突破 18 亿，具体来看：

    "The Volunteers: A Bloody Peace" achieved a box office of 442 million yuan for the period, accounting for 24.6%; "731" achieved a box office of 340 million yuan, accounting for 18.9%.

    "A Writer's Odyssey 2" ranked third with a box office of 290 million yuan for the period, accounting for 16.1%.

    "Wandering Life," "Deafening," "The Starry Sky of the Three Kingdoms Part One," "Wind, Forest, Fire, Mountain," "The Proof of Bi Zhengming," and "GG Bond: A Pig's Counterattack" entered the top nine rankings.

item.title: 霉霉新专电影票房破 4600 万美元
item.guid: 霉霉新专电影票房破-4600-万美元
item.description:
According to Sina Film, superstar singer Taylor Swift's new album film project "The Official Release Party of a Showgirl" grossed an estimated $33 million in its opening weekend/three days in North America, taking the top spot on the North American weekly chart this week. 据新浪电影报道，巨星歌手泰勒·斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）的新专辑电影项目《The Official Release Party of a Showgirl》北美上映首周/三天票房粗报 3300 万美元，夺下这个星期的北美周榜冠军。

Globally, the film grossed $46 million in its opening week, and received a rare A+ CinemaScore from audiences. 影片的全球首周票房方面获 4600 万美元，CinemaScore 观众评分为少见的 A+。

The film is a "non-traditional movie," with 89 minutes of content including new music videos from the new album "The Life of a Showgirl," behind-the-scenes footage of the album's production, and more. It's worth noting that the film was only screened from October 3rd to 5th. 该影片为一部「非传统电影」，89 分钟内容包括新专辑《The Life of a Showgirl》中的新歌 MV、专辑制作幕后画面等。值得一提的是，该片仅在 10 月 3 日至 5 日上映。

item.title: 电影《不东》宣布杀青
item.description:
According to Sina Film, the running-themed movie "Bu Dong" recently completed filming in the Gobi Desert of Guazhou, Gansu. 据新浪电影消息，跑步题材电影《不东》日前在甘肃瓜州戈壁圆满杀青。

The film tells the story of a group of runners who measure life with their steps and "run" towards dawn for their dreams, paying tribute to everyone who stumbles on their life's journey but never stops. 电影讲述一群跑者以脚步丈量生命，为梦想「跑」出黎明的故事，致敬每一个在人生路上跌跌撞撞却未曾停下的人。

The film is directed by Wu Feiyue and Qin Xiaoyu, starring Deng Jiajia, with Gu Jiacheng, Tang Jiawen, Ju Bochan, Liu Jiaxi, Hamza, Cai Shaotian, Kang Xuan, Lu Xiaolin, and Liu Yuze in supporting roles, and Zhang Guoqiang making a special appearance. 该片由吴飞跃、秦晓宇执导，邓家佳领衔主演，谷嘉诚、汤加文、鞠帛展、刘贾玺、Hamza、蔡少天、康轩、吕晓霖、刘禹泽主演，张国强特邀出演。
